issue.title: [C++][Gandiva] Implement castVARCHAR(numeric_type) functions in Gandiva
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7215](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7215). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Support following function signature in Gandiva:
 FunctionSignature{name =castVARCHAR, return type =Utf8, param types =[numeric_type, Int(64, true)]}

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7215?focusedCommentId=17003551) by Praveen Kumar (praveenbingo):*
Issue resolved by pull request 5956
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/5956>

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7215?focusedCommentId=17019869) by Projjal Chanda (projjal):*
Reverting the earlier commit since it seems there was some bug in it.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7215?focusedCommentId=17322056) by Praveen Kumar (praveenbingo):*
